attributes.additional_details: Delay in shale gas extraction is causing an emergency in heating homes when there is more than enough gas available through fracking.
attributes.background:
Shale gas extraction through fracking should start immediately. To prevent a lot of misery and possible death through hyperthermia 
this winter with the elderly and low income
public.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/622775

The Government has lifted the shale gas moratorium and confirmed support for a new oil and gas licensing round: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/uk-government-takes-next-steps-to-boost-domestic-energy-production
